attributes.action: Sack the head of the council and the head of social services and the head of child services at Haringey Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the appalling cruelty and murder of BABY P in Haringey, this after the promises made after the murder of Victoria Climbie, this whole council should be sent packing. If this is not possible then the Head of the Council and the Heads of the responsible departments should be forced to resign, with no pension rights.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
